column5: Enjoy our charming, rustic cabin situated on 9 magical acres of the Texas Hill Country with 500 feet of beautiful Blanco River frontage. The 2-story cabin sleeps up to 6, with 2 bedrooms upstairs and 1 bathroom downstairs, and full kitchen. A spring-fed creek runs most of the year (except during dry periods), and there is an outdoor game pavilion stocked with a ping-pong table, corn-hole and ladder ball games, and horse shoes.
